Text.Page:
These squads of Bleakbone undead keep coming up that road due south of us. I have a sinking feeling they're...fresh.

Take these vials. The undead give off a black fluid when you kill them. Fill the vials and bring them back.

Full? Every vial? Fantastic work, !

Now let me see...Oh, Velik's bloody rage, I was right. These poor wretches were alive less than a day ago.

These are the kidnapped townsfolk. They're sending them back to us, the monsters!
Those Bleakbone dragoons, slashers, and defenders are cutting us off from town. Clear them out and help me trace their origins, soldier!
